title: Does speaking involuntarily break your Salah? - Sheikh Assimalhakeem
transcript: that says is your salat invalidated if you speak something in it involuntary no if you speak involuntarily without wanting without intention forced to do this Allah doesn't hold you accountable I'm praying and all of a sudden the child is about to touch something that may kill him and without even think I said whoa watch out and I'm not thinking it just came out impulsively not intending to do it the prayer is valid insha Allah
